summary: Two very different love stories cross each other in warm and magical way. A humanistic and yet mysterious film about love and death near the German/Danish border.
cast: Antoine Monot Jr.|Dominique Horwitz|Beate Bille|Joost Siedhoff|Hanna Schygulla|Erich Krieg|Ketel Weber|Yupp Regeler|Sebastian Schipper|Axel Olsson|Friedrich Karl Praetorius|Traute Hoess|Uwe Rohde|Felix Bassmann|Oliver Frank|Jens Münchow|Sebastian Schultz|Joachim Kindscher|Ole Hedegaard|Armin Dillenberger|Renate Delfs|Peter Schrøder|Henrik Lykkegaard|Peter Kopsch|Tyll Schnäbel
title: Die blaue Grenze
